description: Forensics tool for validating the integrity of PNG based (PNG, JNG, MNG) image files. Can also extract embedded images and text from a file. More information: http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/apps/pngcheck.html.

useCases.description: Verify the integrity of an image file:
Check the file with [v]erbose and [c]olorized output:
Display contents of [t]ext chunks and [s]earch for PNGs within a specific file:
Search for, and e[x]tract embedded PNGs within a specific file:
